name: Dream Flight School
about: Dream Flight School, located at the Carroll County Area Airport in Westminster, Maryland, is a premier training facility offering comprehensive airplane flight instruction. We provide training for private pilot certificates, commercial certificates, and instrument ratings, as well as bi-annual flight reviews. In addition to flight instruction, we offer discovery flights, aircraft rentals for current pilots, and sightseeing tours. Our experienced instructors and modern fleet ensure a safe and effective learning environment. Whether you are aspiring to become a pilot or simply looking to enjoy the thrill of flight, Dream Flight School is dedicated to helping you achieve your aviation goals.
